message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs, offering unparalleled value and performance. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it's worth more than what it costs us to produce. Considering its immense worth to you, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not only to secure a high-quality product but also to benefit from a significant saving. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
